text: Lousado is a freguesia in Portugal in the Vila Nova de Famalicão concelho. It covers 5.61 km² (2.17 sq. mi.). It has a 3,725 people (2001). Its population density is 664.0 people per km² (1,720 per sq. mi.). ==Other websites == *Lousado on freguesiasdeportugal.com *Civil government and administrative information Category:Settlements in Portugal
title: Lousado
